results.content: Goes into detail without wasting time.

The first part is very well, but the part of practic of TDD is very tired and we don't have a lot new concepts, may be the pract with raw PHP ca be better, know slim or eloquent, I thnk these are out of the course scope and it dicult the practics, in resume is good course. and could be beeter if the course cover with Fb webdrive instead of Selenium2TestCase

results.content:
I loved this course, the author explains everything in a good way, even for me non native speaker. I was a bit scared to do an english course but it paid off.

Thanks a lot and greetings from Germany

results.content: This course is outstanding! It covers ground that no other course does. The instructor is well organized and thorough in all his examples and explanations.  I'm looking forward to more of his courses.
results.content_html: This course is outstanding! It covers ground that no other course does. The instructor is well organized and thorough in all his examples and explanations. I'm looking forward to more of his courses.

results.content:
Loved this course! I rarely used Unit Testing before and was always curious about the TDD approach, and with this course I clearly understood their inner working and how to actually use those in a real-life application (not just testing an "Hello World" method as many tutorials say). 
Explanations were pretty clear most of the time (a bit messy every now and then in the TDD section, if you want), parlance was a bit too slow in fact I had to speed up up to 1.75x, but apart from this I enjoyed it very much and it will surely help me in the future. Thank you!
results.content_html:
Loved this course! I rarely used Unit Testing before and was always curious about the TDD approach, and with this course I clearly understood their inner working and how to actually use those in a real-life application (not just testing an "Hello World" method as many tutorials say).
Explanations were pretty clear most of the time (a bit messy every now and then in the TDD section, if you want), parlance was a bit too slow in fact I had to speed up up to 1.75x, but apart from this I enjoyed it very much and it will surely help me in the future. Thank you!

results.content: Me ha encantado las posibilidades que ofrece phpunit, me hubiera gustado que el curso utilizara las últimas versiones de todos los paquetes, pero en general estoy bastante satisfecho.
